items.title: Awesome Appimage
items.content_text:
### AppImage consumption tools / Package managers

*   [AppMan (‚≠ê187)](https://github.com/ivan-hc/AppMan) - AppImage Manager that works like APT or Pacman.
items.content_html:
AppImage consumption tools / Package managers

  • AppMan (‚≠ê187) - AppImage Manager that works like APT or Pacman.

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Food & Drink

- API: [Spoonacular](https://spoonacular.com/food-api)

  Description: Recipes, Food Products, and Meal Planning

  Auth: `apiKey`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown



### Games & Comics

- API: [Humor](https://humorapi.com)

  Description: Humor, Jokes, and Memes

  Auth: `apiKey`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown
items.content_html:
Food & Drink

  • API: Spoonacular

    Description: Recipes, Food Products, and Meal Planning

items.title: Awesome Slim
items.content_text:
### Middlewares

*   [Slim Session (‚≠ê233)](https://github.com/bryanjhv/slim-session) - A very simple session middleware for Slim Framework.
*   [Slim Whoops (‚≠ê132)](https://github.com/zeuxisoo/php-slim-whoops) - PHP whoops error on slim framework.

### Miscellaneous

*   [BasePath (‚≠ê49)](https://github.com/selective-php/basepath) - Base path detector for Slim 4.
items.content_html:
Middlewares

  • Slim Session (‚≠ê233) - A very simple session middleware for Slim Framework.
  • Slim Whoops (‚≠ê132) - PHP whoops error on slim framework.

Miscellaneous

  • BasePath (‚≠ê49) - Base path detector for Slim 4.

Common

  • Weeee.js (‚≠ê3) - Tiny Javascript tweening engine.

items.title: Awesome Cpp

### Scripting

*   [djinni](https://djinni.xlcpp.dev) - A tool for generating cross-language type declarations and interface bindings. \[Apache2]
items.content_html:
Scripting

  • djinni - A tool for generating cross-language type declarations and interface bindings. [Apache2]

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Audio

*   [micropython-buzzer (‚≠ê20)](https://github.com/fruch/micropython-buzzer) - Play Nokia compose and mid files on buzzers.

### Communications / APIs

*   [micropython\_pushbullet (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/gsampallo/micropython_pushbullet) - Simple example of how to use PushBullet with MicroPython on ESP8266.
*   [esp32-youtube-display (‚≠ê17)](https://github.com/alvarowolfx/esp32-youtube-display) - Display YouTube metrics using Google API and MicroPython.
*   [micropython-spotify-web-api (‚≠ê22)](https://github.com/tltx/micropython-spotify-web-api) - A library for using Spotify's web API from a IoT device with MicroPython.

### Communications / Bluetooth

*   [uble (‚≠ê87)](https://github.com/dmazzella/uble) - Lightweight Bluetooth Low Energy driver written in pure Python for MicroPython.

### Communications / Cryptography

*   [micropython-cryptomsg (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/jacklinquan/micropython-cryptomsg) - A MicroPython module to encrypt and decrypt messages with AES CBC mode.

### Communications / FTP

*   [micropython-uaioftp (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/cwyark/micropython-uaioftp) - Lightweight FTP library for MicroPython.

### Communications / GSM

*   [MicroPython-AM7020 (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/JiekangHuang/MicroPython-AM7020) - MicroPython driver for AM7020 Narrowband Internet of Things (NBIoT) module.

### Communications / SOCKS

*   [micropython-socks (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/kost/micropython-socks) - MicroPython library implementing SOCKS server.

### Display / LCD Character

*   [HD44780-lcd-upy](https://gitlab.com/rafalosa/HD44780-lcd-upy) - MicroPython module for controlling a generic HD44780 LCD.

### Display / LCD TFT

*   [st7735\_micropython (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/cheungbx/st7735_micropython) - ST7735 MicroPython drivers for 80x160, 128x128, 128x160 for ESP8266.
*   [ili934x-micropython](https://gitlab.com/mhepp63/ili934x-micropython) - Library for using ILI9341 display drivers with MicroPython.

### Display / LEDs

*   [ws2812-SPI (‚≠ê28)](https://github.com/nickovs/ws2812-SPI) - An efficient MicroPython WS2812 (NeoPixel) driver.
*   [micropython-rgb-led-driver](https://gitlab.com/Athanaze/micropython-rgb-led-driver) - Tiny driver to control an RGB LED with PWM.

### IO / Keyboard

*   [pico-rgbkeypad (‚≠ê67)](https://github.com/martinohanlon/pico-rgbkeypad) - A Python class for controlling the Pimoroni RGB Keypad for Raspberry Pi Pico.
*   [micropython-aiobutton (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/jacklinquan/micropython-aiobutton) - A MicroPython module for asyncio button.

### IO / Shift Registers

*   [micropython-74hc595 (‚≠ê34)](https://github.com/mcauser/micropython-74hc595) - MicroPython driver for 74HC595 8-bit shift registers.
*   [MicroPython-SN74HCS264](https://gitlab.com/olivierlenoir/MicroPython-SN74HCS264) - MicroPython Driver for SN74HCS264 8-Bit Parallel-Out Serial Shift Registers With Schmitt-Trigger Inputs and Inverted Outputs.

### Motion / DC Motor

*   [MicroPython-L298](https://gitlab.com/olivierlenoir/MicroPython-L298) - Drive L298 dual H-bridge with MicroPython.

### Sensors / Barometer - Air and Water Pressure

*   [micropython-bmp180](https://gitlab.com/flowolf/micropython-bmp180) - A module for MicroPython which provides a class for the BMP180 pressure sensor.

### Sensors / Colour

*   [micropython-tcs34725](https://gitlab.com/robhamerling/micropython-tcs34725) - Driver class for TCS34725 and TCS34727 color sensors.

### Sensors / Compass

*   [microPython\_AS5600L (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/capella-ben/microPython_AS5600L) - MicroPython driver for AS5600L magnet rotary position sensor.

### Sensors / Current

*   [micropython-current-monitor](https://gitlab.com/n.rj.powers/micropython-current-monitor) - Current monitor using the INA219 and an SSD1306 OLED.

### Sensors / Gaseous

*   [micropython-sgp40 (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/agners/micropython-sgp40) - MicroPython I2C driver for SGP40 VOC sensor module.

### Sensors / Motion Inertial

*   [flight\_controller (‚≠ê74)](https://github.com/wagnerc4/flight_controller) - MicroPython flight controller.
*   [micropython-mpu9250](https://gitlab.com/nnayo/micropython-mpu9250) - MicroPython MPU-9250 (MPU-6500 + AK8963) I2C driver.

### Sensors / Temperature Analog

*   [mcp9700](https://gitlab.com/CrispyCrafter/mcp9700) - Generic MicroPython driver for MCP9700.

### Sensors / Temperature Digital

*   [micropython\_ahtx0 (‚≠ê43)](https://github.com/targetblank/micropython_ahtx0) - MicroPython driver for the AHT10 and AHT20 temperature and humidity sensors.

### Sensors / Touch Capacitive

*   [uFT6336U (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/fantasticdonkey/uFT6336U) - MicroPython I2C driver for the Focus LCDs FT6336U capacitive touch panel controller IC.

### Storage / EEPROM

*   [mb\_24x256\_512 (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/MarksBench/mb_24x256_512) - Very simple MicroPython module/driver for Microchip 24x256 and 24x512 I2C EEPROM devices.

### Storage / PSRAM

*   [mb\_PSRAM\_64Mb\_SPI (‚≠ê13)](https://github.com/MarksBench/mb_PSRAM_64Mb_SPI) - Very simple MicroPython module to use a generic 64Mbit PSRAM (ie Adafruit 4677) with a Raspberry Pi Pico (RP2040).

### Storage / SRAM

*   [mb\_23LC1024 (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/MarksBench/mb_23LC1024) - Very simple MicroPython module to use a Microchip 23LC1024 SPI SRAM with a Raspberry Pi Pico (RP2040).
*   [mb\_47x16 (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/MarksBench/mb_47x16) - Very simple MicroPython module/driver for Microchip 47x16 EERAM devices (47L/47C).

### IDEs / SRAM

*   [Pyboard File Manager (‚≠ê6)](https://github.com/joewez/PyboardFileManager) - Pyboard File Manager: Windows GUI for Pyboard.py compatible devices.
items.content_html:
Audio

  • micropython-buzzer (‚≠ê20) - Play Nokia compose and mid files on buzzers.

Communications / APIs

  • micropython_pushbullet (‚≠ê3) - Simple example of how to use PushBullet with MicroPython on ESP8266.
  • esp32-youtube-display (‚≠ê17) - Display YouTube metrics using Google API and MicroPython.
  • micropython-spotify-web-api (‚≠ê22) - A library for using Spotify's web API from a IoT device with MicroPython.

Communications / Bluetooth

  • uble (‚≠ê87) - Lightweight Bluetooth Low Energy driver written in pure Python for MicroPython.

Communications / Cryptography

  • micropython-cryptomsg (‚≠ê5) - A MicroPython module to encrypt and decrypt messages with AES CBC mode.

Communications / FTP

  • micropython-uaioftp (‚≠ê3) - Lightweight FTP library for MicroPython.

Communications / GSM

  • MicroPython-AM7020 (‚≠ê3) - MicroPython driver for AM7020 Narrowband Internet of Things (NBIoT) module.

Communications / SOCKS

  • micropython-socks (‚≠ê5) - MicroPython library implementing SOCKS server.

Display / LCD Character

  • HD44780-lcd-upy - MicroPython module for controlling a generic HD44780 LCD.

Display / LCD TFT

  • st7735_micropython (‚≠ê3) - ST7735 MicroPython drivers for 80x160, 128x128, 128x160 for ESP8266.
  • ili934x-micropython - Library for using ILI9341 display drivers with MicroPython.

Display / LEDs

  • ws2812-SPI (‚≠ê28) - An efficient MicroPython WS2812 (NeoPixel) driver.
  • micropython-rgb-led-driver - Tiny driver to control an RGB LED with PWM.

IO / Keyboard

  • pico-rgbkeypad (‚≠ê67) - A Python class for controlling the Pimoroni RGB Keypad for Raspberry Pi Pico.
  • micropython-aiobutton (‚≠ê4) - A MicroPython module for asyncio button.

IO / Shift Registers

  • micropython-74hc595 (‚≠ê34) - MicroPython driver for 74HC595 8-bit shift registers.
  • MicroPython-SN74HCS264 - MicroPython Driver for SN74HCS264 8-Bit Parallel-Out Serial Shift Registers With Schmitt-Trigger Inputs and Inverted Outputs.

Motion / DC Motor

  • MicroPython-L298 - Drive L298 dual H-bridge with MicroPython.

Sensors / Barometer - Air and Water Pressure

  • micropython-bmp180 - A module for MicroPython which provides a class for the BMP180 pressure sensor.

Sensors / Colour

  • micropython-tcs34725 - Driver class for TCS34725 and TCS34727 color sensors.

Sensors / Compass

  • microPython_AS5600L (‚≠ê4) - MicroPython driver for AS5600L magnet rotary position sensor.

Sensors / Current

  • micropython-current-monitor - Current monitor using the INA219 and an SSD1306 OLED.

Sensors / Gaseous

  • micropython-sgp40 (‚≠ê4) - MicroPython I2C driver for SGP40 VOC sensor module.

Sensors / Motion Inertial

  • flight_controller (‚≠ê74) - MicroPython flight controller.
  • micropython-mpu9250 - MicroPython MPU-9250 (MPU-6500 + AK8963) I2C driver.

Sensors / Temperature Analog

  • mcp9700 - Generic MicroPython driver for MCP9700.

Sensors / Temperature Digital

  • micropython_ahtx0 (‚≠ê43) - MicroPython driver for the AHT10 and AHT20 temperature and humidity sensors.

Sensors / Touch Capacitive

  • uFT6336U (‚≠ê8) - MicroPython I2C driver for the Focus LCDs FT6336U capacitive touch panel controller IC.

Storage / EEPROM

  • mb_24x256_512 (‚≠ê1) - Very simple MicroPython module/driver for Microchip 24x256 and 24x512 I2C EEPROM devices.

Storage / PSRAM

  • mb_PSRAM_64Mb_SPI (‚≠ê13) - Very simple MicroPython module to use a generic 64Mbit PSRAM (ie Adafruit 4677) with a Raspberry Pi Pico (RP2040).

Storage / SRAM

  • mb_23LC1024 (‚≠ê2) - Very simple MicroPython module to use a Microchip 23LC1024 SPI SRAM with a Raspberry Pi Pico (RP2040).
  • mb_47x16 (‚≠ê1) - Very simple MicroPython module/driver for Microchip 47x16 EERAM devices (47L/47C).

IDEs / SRAM

  • Pyboard File Manager (‚≠ê6) - Pyboard File Manager: Windows GUI for Pyboard.py compatible devices.

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Framework-agnostic Plugins / Integrations

*   [vite-plugin-wasm-pack (‚≠ê258)](https://github.com/nshen/vite-plugin-wasm-pack) - Integration with rust [wasm-pack (‚≠ê6.7k)](https://github.com/rustwasm/wasm-pack), the simple way.

### Framework-agnostic Plugins / Transformers

*   [vite-plugin-require (‚≠ê84)](https://github.com/wangzongming/vite-plugin-require) - A Vite plugin that supports `require` by code transforming.
items.content_html:
Framework-agnostic Plugins / Integrations

  • vite-plugin-wasm-pack (‚≠ê258) - Integration with rust wasm-pack (‚≠ê6.7k), the simple way.

Framework-agnostic Plugins / Transformers

  • vite-plugin-require (‚≠ê84) - A Vite plugin that supports require by code transforming.
